alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Clinch; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 11:30AM EDT until June 19 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Nassau County in northeastern Florida... Northwestern Camden County in southeastern Georgia... Southern Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... Southeastern Clinch County in southeastern Georgia... Charlton County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 1215 PM EDT. * At 1130 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Braganza to near Stephen Foster State Park to 8 miles southeast of Fargo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park, Homeland, Race Pond and Winokur. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
